performance hint

variable render hint¶

this is faster than without this (avoid scope chain)¶

{
  top: 'top',
  arr: [{v:1},{v:2},{v:3},{v:4}]
}

slower:

{{top}}
{{#each(arr)}}
{{v}}
{{/each}}

faster:

{{this.top}}
{{#each(arr)}}
{{this.v}}
{{/each}}

root is faster in block (avoid scope chain)¶

{
  title: 't',
  arr: [{v:1},{v:2},{v:3},{v:4}]
}

slower:

{{#each(arr)}}
{{v}}{{title}}
{{/each}}

faster:

{{#each(arr)}}
{{v}}{{root.title}}
{{/each}}
